SMBus Block Count Register

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x38
Size:
0x4

Description

Block transfer byte count

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:6] reserved r 0x0 Reserved
[5:0] block_count rw 0x0 Block Count

Field Descriptions

reserved - Reserved

Reserved bits

block_count - Block Count

Number of bytes for block transfer (1-32)
